title: Crew Show!
description: This week we talk about the C7 Corvette, Greg Fitzsimmons' podcast, the Audi RS5, Forum Tantrums, Matt drives a Formula Drift Car, lunch tray drifting, and the Venom GT Guinness Record.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: This week we talk about the C7 Corvette, Greg Fitzsimmons' podcast, the Audi RS5, Forum Tantrums, Matt drives a Formula Drift Car, lunch tray drifting, and the Venom GT Guinness Record.
